mng: fragrant, sweet smelling, aromatic, savory or appetizing, (to eat) with relish, (of sleep) sound, perfume or spice, joss or incense stick

exm.mng: interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
incense burning in front of a temple, burning joss sticks
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
a censer (for burning incense), incense burner, thurible
